tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Sir, I always like your publications on YouTube and especially your exchanges with your mother (for Mother's Day) and with your father. I have been suffering from Algodystrophy from one year and a half following an accident at work. All the treatments I underwent did not cure me. But your smile, your kindness, your humanity, your treatment and your advice have given me a lot of hope for recovery. I already feel better and I will continue the exercises you suggested. I really appreciated the quality of care provided by all the staff at your clinic. The cleanliness of the premises is wonderful. It would be good for all patients if all hospitals and clinics and if all doctors and care staff were like you and like your team in our Mother India. As planned, I will come back to meet you next month for another consultation. Thank you very much Sir. Mrs VEL Tilagavady

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Iam visiting Dr. Ashwin Vijay for the first time regarding my frozen shoulder issue. Doctor was very friendly , warm and went through my MRI scan and suggested the best . He asked me to start with physiotherapy and gave some medicines . He assured me not to worry about the issue and told if the pain does not go away he shall take the next steps which was really healing and gave me more confidence. The whole process at his clinic is patient friendly and kind . Iam highly satisfied with my first visit. Thanks doctor and team .. looking forward for my physiotherapy sessions there at your clinic .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: friendly and humanitarian approach.specific treatment to the current issue of the patient. the atmosphere is very good.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Problem statement : Am in my early 40s who follows very strict lifestyle, be it food, exercise, sleep, work life balance etc. During Covid my routine changed with lack of exercises. Post Covid when I started working out, my knees weren‚Äôt supportive. I started feeling heaviness around my knees when I jog or jump

My experience: Ojas hospital building gets more than 5* for the interiors and architecture. You will feel entering a 7* hotel. All staffs are very kind and professional. They answer every question you ask without slacking.

I had to wait for 45 mins approx. for the consultation (this is ok because doctors schedules can‚Äôt be on the point). When I met the doctor he was very kind and attentive in listening to my problem statement. He recommended x-ray to diagnose my issue.

When the x-ray was out he prescribed physiotherapy and mild medications. I am not convinced with his diagnosis or his explanation for my problem. I have pain in both my knees while the doctor gave the root cause only for one knee which I am not convinced. His explanation wasn‚Äôt detailed to a layman person.

Wish doctor explained me clearly the cause and the diagnosis statement. May be it‚Äôs too early for him to conclude?

I am glad for others who are very much satisfied with his treatment while am looking for such good experience. Hope during my next review session he will explain things more clearly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Staff at Ojas were courteous, professional and made my visit very comfortable. I had prompt responses to all of my enquires whenever I called them.

 I have had tremendous pain for years and been in and out of MRI scanners. I learnt about DR Ashwin from one of my friends and had an appointment with him on 04/04/2022, He told me that though I had some physiological issues, the pain was mainly aggravated by stress. He suggested yoga as the MAGIC KEY to all my pains. I was surprised and wasn't sure of what to expect. But I believed that it would be the best way ahead as he reassured me that things would be better soon with yoga.  Both me and my husband are every so grateful to DR Ashwin for all his help.  

God Bless!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Unlike other Doctors, Dr. Aswin is dealing in a friendly manner. While almost present day doctors follow their time conscious pattern in dealing with their patients, this Doctor contributes his time to give an initial  consolation to his patient and then proceeds in his diagnosis. Further, he takes more care in making the patient to understand his ailment fully. He makes a patient to realise and believe that the Doctor(Aswin) in front is not a stranger, who can do all good to him, faithfully. 
When I visited, I blessed the Doctor whole heartedly. He is a person who respects elders normally. I wish he and his team to render a further more good service to needy people.
